scripts.build spa server: rm -r -f spa/dist && webpack --config spa/webpack.config.js && cd spa/dist && zip spa.zip spa.js
scripts.build sendmephone: rm -r -f sendMePhone/dist && webpack --config sendMePhone/webpack.config.js && cd sendMePhone/dist && zip sendMePhone.zip sendMePhone.js
scripts.build sign-in: rm -r -f signIn/dist && webpack --config signIn/webpack.config.js && cd signIn/dist && zip signIn.zip index.js
